title: Delivericious
keywords: paramana, work, project, Delivericious website, design & development
description: Τhe website of Delivericious was designed and developed by Paramana.com
maintext:
Online search engine of food-delivery in Athens.

A simple idea, a big project; Delivericious is the home-project of paramana.com.

The website one needs those cold winter days when the fridge is empty and the food-delivery brochures somewhere you just can't remember..

Simply fill-in your location, chose a food-type and wait for the results to pop up!

This web service intuitively lets users to choose and make their order, overview the total cost of it and compare betweenavailable delivery stores in their neighborhood.
techstext: XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, ΧΜL, PHP, MySQL
